verses.verse: In the beginning<WH7225> of the reign<WH4467> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> the son<WH1121> of Josiah,<WH2977> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> came this word<WH1697> to Jeremiah<WH3414> from Yahweh,<WH3068> saying,<WH559>
Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> to me:<WH6213> Make bonds<WH4147> and bars,<WH4133> and put<WH5414> them on your neck;<WH6677>

and send<WH7971> them to the king<WH4428> of Edom,<WH123> and to the king<WH4428> of Moab,<WH4124> and to the king<WH4428> of the children of Ammon,<WH1121> and to the king<WH4428> of Tyre,<WH6865> and to the king<WH4428> of Sidon,<WH6721> by the hand<WH3027> of the messengers<WH4397> who come<WH935> to Jerusalem<WH3389> to Zedekiah<WH6667> king<WH4428> of Judah;<WH3063>
and give them a command<WH6680> to their masters,<WH113> saying,<WH559> Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> You shall tell<WH559> your masters:<WH113>

I have made<WH6213> the earth,<WH776> the men<WH120> and the animals<WH929> that are on<WH6440> the surface of the earth,<WH776> by my great<WH1419> power<WH3581> and by my outstretched<WH5186> arm;<WH2220> and I give<WH5414> it to whom it seems<WH5869> right to me.<WH3474>

Now have I given<WH5414> all these lands<WH776> into the hand<WH3027> of Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> the king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> my servant;<WH5650> and the animals<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> also have I given<WH5414> him to serve him.<WH5647>

All the nations<WH1471> shall serve<WH5647> him,<WH1121> and his son, and his son<WH1121>'s son,<WH1121> until the time<WH6256> of his own land<WH776> come:<WH935> and then many<WH7227> nations<WH1471> and great<WH1419> kings<WH4428> shall make him their bondservant.<WH5647>

It shall happen,<WH1471> that the nation and the kingdom<WH4467> which will not serve<WH5647> the same Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> and that will not put<WH5414> their neck<WH6677> under the yoke<WH5923> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> that nation<WH1471> will I punish,<WH6485> says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> with the sword,<WH2719> and with the famine,<WH7458> and with the pestilence,<WH1698> until I have consumed<WH8552> them by his hand.<WH3027>

But as for you,<WH8085> don't you listen to your prophets,<WH5030> nor to your diviners,<WH7080> nor to your dreams,<WH2472> nor to your soothsayers,<WH6049> nor to your sorcerers,<WH3786> who speak<WH559> to you,<WH559> saying, You shall not serve<WH5647> the king<WH4428> of Babylon:<WH894>
for they prophesy<WH5012> a lie<WH8267> to you,<WH7368> to remove you far from your land,<WH127> and that I should drive you out,<WH5080> and you should perish.<WH6>

But the nation<WH1471> that shall bring<WH935> their neck<WH6677> under the yoke<WH5923> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> and serve<WH5647> him,<WH3240> that nation will I let remain in their own land,<WH127> says<WH5002> Yahweh;<WH3068> and they shall till<WH5647> it,<WH3427> and dwell therein.

I spoke<WH1696> to Zedekiah<WH6667> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> according to all these words,<WH1697> saying,<WH559> Bring<WH935> your necks<WH6677> under the yoke<WH5923> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> and serve<WH5647> him and his people,<WH5971> and live.<WH2421>

Why will you die,<WH4191> you and your people,<WH5971> by the sword,<WH2719> by the famine,<WH7458> and by the pestilence,<WH1698> as Yahweh<WH3068> has spoken<WH1696> concerning the nation<WH1471> that will not serve<WH5647> the king<WH4428> of Babylon?<WH894>

Don't<WH8085> listen to the words<WH1697> of the prophets<WH5030> who speak<WH559> to you,<WH559> saying, You shall not serve<WH5647> the king<WH4428> of Babylon;<WH894> for they prophesy<WH5012> a lie to you.<WH8267>

For I have not sent<WH7971> them,<WH5002> says Yahweh,<WH3068> but they prophesy<WH5012> falsely<WH8267> in my name;<WH8034> that I may drive you out,<WH5080> and that you may perish,<WH6> you,<WH5030> and the prophets who prophesy to you.<WH5012>

Also I spoke<WH1696> to the priests<WH3548> and to all this people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> Thus says<WH559> Yahweh:<WH3068> Don't<WH8085> listen to the words<WH1697> of your prophets<WH5030> who prophesy<WH5012> to you,<WH559> saying, Behold,<WH3627> the vessels of Yahweh<WH3068>'s house<WH1004> shall now shortly<WH4120> be brought again<WH7725> from Babylon;<WH894> for they prophesy<WH5012> a lie to you.<WH8267>
Don't<WH8085> listen to them;<WH5647> serve the king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> and live:<WH2421> why should this city<WH5892> become a desolation?<WH2723>

But if they be prophets,<WH5030> and if the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> be<WH3426> with them,<WH6293> let them now make intercession to Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> that the vessels<WH3627> which are left<WH3498> in the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and in the house<WH1004> of the king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and at Jerusalem,<WH3389> don't<WH935> go to Babylon.<WH894>

For thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> concerning the pillars,<WH5982> and concerning the sea,<WH3220> and concerning the bases,<WH4350> and concerning the residue<WH3499> of the vessels<WH3627> that are left<WH3498> in this city,<WH5892>

which Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> didn't<WH3947> take, when he carried away captive<WH1540> Jeconiah<WH3204> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiakim,<WH3079> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> from Jerusalem<WH3389> to Babylon,<WH894> and all the nobles<WH2715> of Judah<WH3063> and Jerusalem;<WH3389>

yes,<WH559> thus says Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> concerning the vessels<WH3627> that are left<WH3498> in the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and in the house<WH1004> of the king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and at Jerusalem:<WH3389>

They shall be carried<WH935> to Babylon,<WH894> and there shall they be,<WH3117> until the day that I visit<WH6485> them,<WH5002> says Yahweh;<WH3068> then will I bring<WH5927> them up,<WH7725> and restore them to this place.<WH4725>
